thread.section_title: Avas Flowers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Avas Flowers | avasflowers.com
thread.title: Shelley Duke (SW Medical Foundation)
thread.title_full: Avas Flowers reviewed by Shelley Duke (SW Medical Foundation)

author: Shelley Duke (SW Medical Foundation)
title: Shelley Duke (SW Medical Foundation)
text: I wanted to order flowers to be sent to a coworker's home, but wasn't familiar with a florist in the area. I googled "flowers" and the zip code, and up came Ava's! I was pleased with their competitive pricing (they were even having a 'sale' that day!) and the numerous options available. The site was easy to navigate, and I was happy to receive emails regarding both the placement of my order and the delivery. The best part: The recipient loved the colors and the fragrance! I'll definitely use Ava's again!
